controller

Class GiftController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.GiftController

  • public class GiftController
extends java.lang.Object
    GiftController is the controller class for Gift function

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GiftController()
      Creates GiftController object and initialize giftList with gift data from GiftDAO

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkDailyLimit(Player player)
      Check if player has hit the daily limit of sending 5 gifts
      boolean checkIfCanGift(Player player, Player friend)
      Check if player is able to send a gift to his friend for that day
      boolean checkIfGivingSelf(Player player, Player friend)
      Check if the player is sending gift to himself
      boolean checkIfHaveGift(SeedController seedCtrl, Player player, int choice)
      Check if the player's seedList has the seed he wants to send as gift
      boolean checkIfInFriendList(Player player, Player friend, FriendController friendCtrl)
      Check if the gift the player is sending to is his friend
      void executeGift(SeedController seedCtrl, int choice, Player player, Player friend)
      Sends a gift to player's friend
      java.util.ArrayList<Gift> retrieveAll()
      Get the list of all gift

    • Constructor Detail

      • GiftController

        public GiftController()
        Creates GiftController object and initialize giftList with gift data from GiftDAO

    • Method Detail

      • retrieveAll

        public java.util.ArrayList<Gift> retrieveAll()
        Get the list of all gift
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of Gift

      • checkIfGivingSelf

        public boolean checkIfGivingSelf(Player player,
                                 Player friend)
        Check if the player is sending gift to himself
        Parameters:
        player - the player object
        friend - the player object of player's friend
        Returns:
        true if player is not sending gift to himself; false if player is sending gift to himself

      • checkIfInFriendList

        public boolean checkIfInFriendList(Player player,
                                   Player friend,
                                   FriendController friendCtrl)
        Check if the gift the player is sending to is his friend
        Parameters:
        player - the player object
        friend - the player object of player's friend
        friendCtrl - friendController to access player's friendList
        Returns:
        true if friend is in player's friendList; false if friend is not in the player's friendList

      • checkIfHaveGift

        public boolean checkIfHaveGift(SeedController seedCtrl,
                               Player player,
                               int choice)
        Check if the player's seedList has the seed he wants to send as gift
        Parameters:
        seedCtrl - seedController to access the player's seedList
        player - the player object
        choice - the choice of seed the player wish to send
        Returns:
        true if seed is in seedList (can send gift); false if seed is not in seedList (cannot send gift)

      • checkIfCanGift

        public boolean checkIfCanGift(Player player,
                              Player friend)
        Check if player is able to send a gift to his friend for that day
        Parameters:
        player - the player object
        friend - the player object of player's friend
        Returns:
        true if player can send gift to his friend; false if player cannot send gift to his friend

      • checkDailyLimit

        public boolean checkDailyLimit(Player player)
        Check if player has hit the daily limit of sending 5 gifts
        Parameters:
        player - the player object
        Returns:
        true if player has not meet the daily limit; false if player has hit the daily limit

      • executeGift

        public void executeGift(SeedController seedCtrl,
                        int choice,
                        Player player,
                        Player friend)
        Sends a gift to player's friend
        Parameters:
        seedCtrl - seedController to process add/remove seed and access player's seedList
        choice - the choice of seed to be sent
        player - the player object
        friend - the player object of player's friend
